  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:melt.cup.cam.ac.uk:cahi1:data_94797</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_94797</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="fr">Section transversale d'une météorite</string>
            <string language="en">Cross-section of a meteorite</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Querschnitt eines Meteorits</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Cross-section de um meteorite</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Sezione trasversale di un meteorite</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Διατομή ενός μετεωρίτη</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Sección representativa de un meteorito</string>
          </title>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <description>
            <string language="fr">Cette illustration montre la section transversale d'une météorite qui est principalement faite de métal de fer et d'oxyde de fer.</string>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows the cross-section of a meteorite that is mainly made of iron metal and iron oxide.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">le fer</string>
            <string language="en">iron</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">oxyde de fer</string>
            <string language="en">iron oxide</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">métal</string>
            <string language="en">metal</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">météorite</string>
            <string language="en">meteorite</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">étoile filante</string>
            <string language="en">shooting star</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt den Querschnitt eines 
Meteorits, der hauptsächlich vom Eisenmetall und vom Eisenoxid 
gebildet wird.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra o cross-section de um 
meteorite que seja feito principalmente do metal do ferro e do óxido 
do ferro.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra la sezione trasversale
di un meteorite che pricipalmente è fatto del metallo del ferro e 
dell'ossido del ferro.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει τη διατομή ενός 
μετεωρίτη που αποτελείται κυρίως από το μέταλλο σιδήρου και το 
οξείδιο σιδήρου.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra la sección 
representativa de un meteorito que se haga principalmente del metal 
del hierro y del óxido del hierro.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Eisen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Eisenoxid</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Metall</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Meteorit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">schießender Stern</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">ferro</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">óxido do ferro</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">metal</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">meteorite</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">estrela disparando</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">ferro</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">ossido del ferro</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">metallo</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">meteorite</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">stella di fucilazione</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">σίδηρος</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">οξείδιο σιδήρου</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">μέταλλο</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">μετεωρίτης</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">πυροβολισμός αστέρι</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">hierro</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">óxido del hierro</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">metal</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">meteorito</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">estrella que tira</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
